data.enText: to clean or brush an animal

data.chText: 这些马都喂得饱饱的，刷洗得干干净净。
data.enText: The horses are all well fed and groomed.

data.chText: （给自己或其他动物）理毛，梳毛
data.enText: to clean the fur or skin of another animal or itself
a female ape grooming her mate
to prepare or train sb for an important job or position

data.chText: 我们的初级雇员正在接受培训以承担更重要的职责。
data.enText: Our junior employees are being groomed for more senior roles.

data.chText: 长子正在接受培养，以在父亲过世后接手父业。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.enText: The eldest son is being groomed to take over when his father dies.

data.chText: 为约会（儿童）做准备，引诱（尤指利用互联网聊天室进行非法性活动）

before.enText: of a person who is sexually attracted to children

data.enText: to prepare a child for a meeting, especially using an Internet chat room , with the intention of performing an illegal sexual act
a person whose job is to feed and take care of horses, especially by brushing and cleaning them

means: (给自己或其他动物)理毛，梳毛
为约会（儿童）做准备，引诱（尤指利用互联网聊天室进行非法性活动）

ex.enText: a female ape grooming her mate

synonyms.bx: 特指刷洗动物，尤其是马匹；也指动物为自己或另一动物梳理毛发。

tr: a man who has recently been married
a man participant in his own marriage ceremony
someone employed in a stable to take care of the horses
educate for a future role or function
example: He is grooming his son to become his successor
The prince was prepared to become King one day
They trained him to be a warrior

value.def: A groom is the same as a bridegroom .
A groom is someone whose job is to look after the horses in a stable and to keep them clean.
If you groom an animal, you clean its fur, usually by brushing it.

example.ex: The horses were exercised and groomed with special care.
example.tran: 这些马接受专门训练，鬃毛也得到精心梳理。

value.def: If you are groomed for a special job, someone prepares you for it by teaching you the skills you will need.

example.ex: George was already being groomed for the top job...
example.tran: 为承担这份高级工作，乔治已在接受专门的培训。

example.ex: Marshall was groomed to run the family companies.
example.tran: 马歇尔在接手家族企业之前接受了培养。
